title: Creamy Gruyere Chicken Bake
ingredients: ['4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '1 (295g) tin condensed cream of chicken soup', '300ml white wine', '1 teaspoon garlic granules', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon mustard seeds', '125ml soured cream', '4 slices Gruyere cheese', '20g seasoned croutons, crushed', '30g butter, melted']
